title: Office Worker Who Hears Memories - Novel Updates
tags: Businessmen   Hidden Abilities   Male Protagonist   Modern Day
author: 파뱅이
description:
Memories,  impressions or experiences which are either retained in human consciousness or recalled when needed. 

One fine day I could suddenly hear the memories of others.

Listening to the memories which are attached to the objects I managed to stay one step ahead in my life

[Office Worker who Hears Memories]

The story Won Jihoon, who is more human and warmer than anyone, unfold ahead!>
